mapper.sql: ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, CREATE_TIME as createTime, USER_ID as userId, PHONE as phone, PWD as pwd, GESTURE_PWD as gesturePwd, ACCOUNT_STATUS as accountStatus, IMG_URL as imgUrl, NICKNAME as nickname, LOGIN_FAIL_CNT as loginFailCnt, LOGIN_FAIL_TIME as loginFailTime, REMARK as remark, GESTURE_FAIL_CNT as gestureFailCnt, GESTURE_FAIL_TIME as gestureFailTime, OPEN_SYS_MSG as openSysMsg, OPEN_SYS_MSG_TIME as openSysMsgTime, OPEN_ELE_BILL as openEleBill, SOURCE as source, OPEN_ELE_BILL_TIME as openEleBillTime, TOTAL_EARNINGS as totalEarnings, EARNINGS_UP_TIME as earningsUpTime, PAY_PWD as payPwd, DRTYHBH as drtyhbh, PAYPWD_FAIL_CNT as paypwdFailCnt, PAYPWD_FAIL_TIME as paypwdFailTime, DEVICEID as deviceid, REFERRAL as referral, EXPIRY_EARNINGS as expiryEarnings
mapper.insert: insert into drt_account (ACCOUNT_ID, CREATE_TIME, USER_ID, PHONE, PWD, GESTURE_PWD, ACCOUNT_STATUS, IMG_URL, NICKNAME, LOGIN_FAIL_CNT, LOGIN_FAIL_TIME, REMARK, GESTURE_FAIL_CNT, GESTURE_FAIL_TIME, OPEN_SYS_MSG, OPEN_SYS_MSG_TIME, OPEN_ELE_BILL, SOURCE, OPEN_ELE_BILL_TIME, TOTAL_EARNINGS, EARNINGS_UP_TIME, PAY_PWD, DRTYHBH, PAYPWD_FAIL_CNT, PAYPWD_FAIL_TIME, DEVICEID, REFERRAL, EXPIRY_EARNINGS) values (#{accountId}, #{createTime}, #{userId}, #{phone}, #{pwd}, #{gesturePwd}, #{accountStatus}, #{imgUrl}, #{nickname}, #{loginFailCnt}, #{loginFailTime}, #{remark}, #{gestureFailCnt}, #{gestureFailTime}, #{openSysMsg}, #{openSysMsgTime}, #{openEleBill}, #{source}, #{openEleBillTime}, #{totalEarnings}, #{earningsUpTime}, #{payPwd}, #{drtyhbh}, #{paypwdFailCnt}, #{paypwdFailTime}, #{deviceid}, #{referral}, #{expiryEarnings})
